data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Tsuga mertensiana (Mountain hemlock) from sample ARROW-32

Exposition NW, Slope 5 deg, Geology: Granit Hangschutt, Tree line 1305 m, av. Tree height 28 m, Tree cover 80%, Shrub cover 20%, Herb cover 50%, Moss cover 95%, Vegatation type: TSME-Urwald mit einigen Dougl. Homogen, Film number: 694A
